attributes.action: Consider extra curricular activities as education
attributes.additional_details: Consider these activities ‘education’ and value them in the same way as you do schools. Keep dance/ swimming/ theatre classes etc running in the same way you do schools during the pandemic.
attributes.background:
How do you think lifeguards, swimming coaches, horse riding instructors, music/ PE/ dance teachers, performers form a career?! 
There would be no chance of these careers without the commitment and hard work that goes in outside of school hours!!

rejection.details:
